subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Morgan Pressel became the youngest major champion in L.P.G.A. Tour history yesterday with a game well beyond her 18 years, closing with a three-under-par 69 at the Kraft Nabisco Championship as everyone around her self-destructed.
snippet: Morgan Pressel became the youngest major champion in L.P.G.A. Tour history yesterday with a game well beyond her 18 years, closing with a three-under-par 69 at the Kraft Nabisco Championship as everyone around her self-destructed.
